GOOGLE_ACCOUNT_CANNOT_RECOVER: Google account password cannot be recovered
INVALID_PASSWORD_FORMAT: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
INVALID_PASSWORD_MIN_FORMAT: Password must be at least 8 characters long
INVALID_USERNAME_MIN_FORMAT: Username must be at least 3 characters long
INVALID_USERNAME_MAX_FORMAT: Username must be at most 30 characters long
INVALID_USERNAME_FORMAT: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens
INVALID_CODE_FORMAT: Verification code must be 6 characters long
VERIFICATION_CODE_CREATED: Verification code has been created and sent to your email
VERIFICATION_CODE_RECREATED: Verification code has been recreated and sent to your email. {attemptsCount} attempts remaining
TOO_MANY_VERIFICATION_ATTEMPTS: Too many verification attempts. Please try again in {remainingTime}
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with this email already exists
